name: Broken Memories
overrideDescription: Return a consumed spell to the top of your draw pile.
cardLoreTooltips: Divines be Damned! Take it back, all of it! I don’t want this memory, this power, this grief. I gave it up once and I’ll do it again if it means I can live in peace. Have the years of endless labor not been enough to atone? Will it ever be enough!
